Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Aparthotel Attica 21 As Galeras in Oleiros (Camposeiras), you'll be close to Bastiagueiro Beach and Palexco Congress Centre. This hotel is within close proximity of Santa Cruz Castle and San Anton Castle Archaeological and History Museum.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 96 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchens. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and flat-screen televisions are provided for your entertainment. Conveniences include safes and desks, and you can also request cribs/infant beds (complimentary).

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take in the views from a terrace and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner, or grab a snack at a coffee shop/café.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include express check-in, complimentary newspapers in the lobby, and dry cleaning/laundry services. This hotel has 3 meeting rooms available for events.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner, or grab a snack at a coffee shop/café.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Bastiagueiro Beach - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Santa Cruz Castle - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
San Anton Castle Archaeological and History Museum - 4 km / 2.5 mi
Museo Militar - 4.3 km / 2.7 mi
Jardin de San Carlos - 4.3 km / 2.7 mi
Luis Seoane Foundation - 4.5 km / 2.8 mi
Coliseum da Coruna - 4.6 km / 2.9 mi
Church of Santiago - 4.6 km / 2.9 mi
Emilia Pardo Bazan House Museum - 4.6 km / 2.9 mi
Maria Pita House Museum - 4.6 km / 2.9 mi
Santa Maria del Campo Collegiate Church - 4.6 km / 2.9 mi
Plaza de Maria Pita - 4.8 km / 3 mi
La Coruna City Hall - 4.8 km / 3 mi
Galerias Corunesas - 4.9 km / 3 mi
Palexco Congress Centre - 4.9 km / 3 mi

The preferred airport for Aparthotel Attica 21 As Galeras is La Coruna (LCG) - 5 km / 3.1 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Hotel Attica 21 As Galeras is La Coruna (LCG) - 5.2 km / 3.2 mi.
